verses.verse: Do you indeed <WH552> speak <WH1696> righteousness, <WH6664> silent ones? <WH482> Do you judge <WH8199> blamelessly, <WH4339> you sons <WH1121> of men? <WH120>
No, <WH3820> in your heart you plot <WH6466> injustice. <WH5766> You measure <WH6424> out the violence <WH2555> of your hands <WH3027> in the earth. <WH776>
The wicked <WH7563> go astray <WH2114> from the womb. <WH7358> They are wayward <WH8582> as soon as they are born, <WH990> speaking <WH1696> lies. <WH3577>
Their poison <WH2534> is like <WH1823> the poison <WH2534> of a snake; <WH5175> like a deaf <WH2795> cobra <WH6620> that stops <WH331> its ear, <WH241>
which doesn't <WH8085> listen to the voice <WH6963> of charmers, <WH3907> no matter how skillful <WH2449> the charmer may be. <WH2266>
Break <WH2040> their teeth, <WH8127> God, <WH430> in their mouth. <WH6310> Break out <WH5422> the great teeth <WH4459> of the young lions, <WH3715> Yahweh. <WH3068>
Let them vanish as water <WH4325> that flows <WH1980> away. <WH3988> When they draw <WH1869> the bow, <WH2671> let their arrows be made blunt. <WH4135>
Let them be like a snail <WH7642> which melts <WH8557> and passes away, <WH1980> like the stillborn <WH5309> child, <WH802> who has not seen <WH2372> the sun. <WH8121>
Before your pots <WH5518> can feel <WH995> the heat of the thorns, <WH329> he will sweep <WH8175> away the green <WH2416> and the burning alike. <WH2740>
The righteous <WH6662> shall rejoice <WH8055> when he sees <WH2372> the vengeance. <WH5359> He shall wash <WH7364> his feet <WH6471> in the blood <WH1818> of the wicked; <WH7563>
so that men <WH120> shall say, <WH559> "Most certainly there is a reward <WH6529> for the righteous. <WH6662> Most certainly there is <WH3426> a God <WH430> who judges <WH8199> the earth. <WH776>"
